title: Patent Patrol: Canyon’s wild cockpit designs; Specialized’s suspension…bottom bracket?
content:
The big, crazy, pie-in-the-sky thinking is our favorite kind of thinking, and this collection of patents from Canyon and Specialized are the best kind of throw-out-the-rules design concepts. Specialized is looking at ways to suspend the cranksets and seatpost inside the frame, and Canyon’s new handlebar, stem, and seatpost designs provide for more ergonomic, comfortable, […]
